_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Questions asked by Venerable Ānanda [an3: Is the teaching of those who teach for giving up greed, hate, and delusion well explained or not?
Are those who practice for giving up greed, hate, and delusion practicing well or not?
Have those who’ve given up greed, hate, and delusion done well in the world, or not?
Declarations made by the householder [an: The teaching of those who teach for giving up greed, hate, and delusion is well explained.
Those who practice for giving up greed, hate, and delusion are practicing well.
Those who’ve given up greed, hate, and delusion have done well in the world.
Praises given to Venerable Ānanda [an3.7: You in the world are practicing well.
You in the world have done well.
